Code in this folder was initially cloned from the repos below and mutilated mercilessly
Author brings the sincerest apologies to the creators of the original code

freetype (github.com/danielgatis/go-freetype/freetype)
glhf     (github.com/faiface/glhf)
pixelgl  (github.com/faiface/pixel/pixelgl)
